p: In Figure 1a, the decline is calculated on day 10 and day 20 compared to the first day for the control sample. The decline on day 10 compared to the first day is smaller than the decline on day 20 compared to the first day. The results obtained on day 20 are lower compared to day 10. The decline from day 10 compared to the first day is between 52–88%. The decline from day 20 compared to the first day is between 27–58%.
